newsitem.title: CHINA: China airliner crash-lands, kills at least 10.
newsitem.headline: China airliner crash-lands, kills at least 10.

text.p: At least 10 people were killed and 20 injured when a China Southern Airlines Boeing 737 crash-landed on Thursday in the southern boomtown of Shenzhen bordering Hong Kong, officials said.
"The attitude of the plane during landing was wrong," an airline official said by telephone.
The airport had been closed after the accident, which involved a scheduled flight from the southwestern city of Chongqing to Shenzhen, officials said.
"The plane is burning," a city official said. "The whole place is chaotic."
Ambulances and rescue workers were ferrying dead and injured passengers from the airport to hospital, while fire engines struggled to put out the blaze, officials said.
The co-pilot of the airliner was among the dead, one official said, but gave no further details.
